Today, the waterfront is still rich in culture and the unique atmosphere of a small city that offers everything the heart desires in terms of experiences, activities, and attractions within easy reach. It’s only natural that an exclusive hotel is located here—right in between the waters of the Limfjord, where the views remain as picturesque as they have always been, and the vibrant city life. Here, you can stay in the best location in the city and look forward to experiencing the echoes of history, the proximity to the water, and the dynamic urban atmosphere from our design hotel, which serves as the perfect platform to enjoy a bit of everything. – Welcome to Pier 5 Hotel in Aalborg. Look forward to a design experience that offers you more than what you would find in a traditional hotel in Aalborg. That’s why we have created a modern hotel right here, allowing you to enjoy the views in a lounge environment where you can taste the city’s best cocktails. Even our drinks are based on local ingredients, which our highly skilled bartenders use to craft a selection of innovative flavor experiences that harmonize with the stories of old, the North Jutland landscape, and the winds over the waters of the Limfjord. Here, you can sit back and enjoy some music from our record player, unless it’s one of those days when local jazz musicians stop by to play their smooth tunes in the lounge. BOOK NOW Book our hotel in Aalborg city center directly on the website and enjoy several benefits When you book your stay at Pier 5 Hotel in Aalborg directly on our website, you always receive plenty of great benefits with your stay. The benefits apply to all Bühlmann hotels when booked online on our official website. Option for early check-in Subject to availability, we offer early check-in for your room. As soon as the room is ready, you will receive a direct notification via SMS. Free breakfast Start your day with a delicious breakfast while enjoying views of the Limfjord from our hotel by Aalborg Harbor. Free coffee upon departure We will send you on your way with a cup of coffee before you leave. The best rate We always give you the best price. If you find a lower price for your stay at our hotel in Aalborg city center elsewhere, we will match it. Free bike rental Take advantage of our bikes, which are free to borrow for overnight guests, and explore beautiful Aalborg. BOOK NOW Book a room at a hotel in beautiful harmony with the city and nature. Right in the center and by the water The newly renovated Pier 5 Hotel on Aalborg’s waterfront offers 154 state-of-the-art rooms in the best location in the city. Here, modern design is beautifully integrated with the harbor, which has left its industrial past behind and transformed into one of the most upscale areas of the city. You will experience how the history and heritage of the harbor are reflected throughout the corridors, common areas, and in the rooms, providing our guests with a unique and inviting hotel experience. Welcome to Pier 5 Hotel – one of Bühlmann’s hotels in Aalborg. VAERFT Cocktail Bar An experience for all senses. The shipyard Aalborg Vaerft A/S was founded in 1912. The shipyard Aalborg Vaerft A/S was located just east of Pier 5 Hotel, and the hotel’s bar has been named VAERFT in honour of the shipyard’s and the old port’s history. VAERFT is much more than a hotel bar. VAERFT is Aalborg’s new local cocktail bar, the place where you unwind with colleagues after a long day, where you gather before a concert, and where innovative cocktails and fantastic surroundings offer you new ways to connect. The aim is clear: VAERFT Cocktail Bar wants to create spectacular cocktails that will appeal to all senses. And we do this using molecular methods and international themes never before seen on Aalborg’s bar scene. read more Modern design Complemented by the old port When you arrive at Pier 5 Hotel in Aalborg, you will immediately notice how the hotel’s modern design complements the old harbor outside. A container-inspired wall, exposed ceiling installations, and contemporary design elements are found throughout the hotel—wherever you move, the old and the new are beautifully united. In the lounge, you are invited to explore the various time zones of history. We have equipped the entire lounge area with cozy nooks where you can sink into soft armchairs, enjoy the sounds of jazz from a vintage record player, and ponder the old secrets of the harbor pier. Frequently Asked Questions about Our Design Hotel at Aalborg Waterfront Here you will find answers to some of the questions we frequently receive at our exclusive hotel in Aalborg city center. Remember, you are always welcome to contact our staff regarding bookings or during your stay. We are always available to provide you with the best service. Is it possible to rent SUP boards at the hotel? With direct access to Limfjorden from our hotel, you have the opportunity to try your hand at stand-up paddleboarding (SUP) during the summer months. Here, you can enjoy the fresh air and be right by the water while gliding smoothly over the waters of Limfjorden. We lend SUP on request for min. 8 people all year round. Where is Pier 5 Hotel located in relation to Aalborg city center? Pier 5 Hotel is located just a short walk from Aalborg city center, making it easily accessible for guests looking to explore the vibrant urban environment. With its location between Musikkens Hus and the Utzon Center, with Aalborg’s Central Waterfront and the fjord on one side and the entrance to Nytorv and Aalborg’s pedestrian streets on the other, you have the best opportunities to experience the city as a guest at our newly renovated design hotel. Om Pier 5 Hotel Det nyrenoverede Pier 5 Hotel på Aalborg havnefront byder på 154 topmoderne værelser med byens bedste udsigt. Her er moderne design kombineret med havnen derude, og du vil opleve, at havnens historie og arv er trukket helt med indenfor. Pier 1 Imports is back in business under new owners - pennlive.com Skip to Article Set weather Back To Main Menu Close Quick Look - Change your current location » Current - Mostly Sunny Tonight Low - Mostly Sunny Tomorrow High - Mostly Sunny View full weather report Unlimited Digital Access - 50% Off - Sale Ends 9/30/25 Life & Culture Pier 1 Imports is back in business under new owners Updated: Mar. 06, 2023, 12:02 p.m. | Published: Oct. 30, 2020, 2:23 p.m. Pier 1 Imports closed its store in Lower Paxton Township. (Daniel Urie, PennLive) By Daniel Urie | durie@pennlive.com Pier 1 Imports is back. Well sort of. The new Pier1 will operate as an e-commerce business. Retail Ecommerce Ventures , the investment firm that acquired the rights to Pier 1′s trademark name, intellectual property, data and various ecommerce-related assets for $31 million in July relaunched Pier1.com on Thursday. Pier 1 Imports filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy this year and closed all of its stores including locations at the Colonial Commons shopping center in Lower Paxton Township and at the Camp Hill shopping center in Camp Hill before the Retail Ecommerce Ventures acquisition. The new owner hired about 15 of Pier 1′s buying, marketing and customer-support personnel. The new 30-person Pier 1 team is now located in Dallas, Texas. “Central to our playbook is retaining the brand’s strengths,” Tai Lopez, executive chairman and co-founder of Retail Ecommerce Ventures said in a press release. “It’s why we retained veteran buyers from Pier 1 to reengage with vendors and bring back the merchandise our customers know and love.” The relaunched online store offers holiday and seasonal items, furniture, pillows and cushions, dining and entertaining items, décor, lighting and candles, rugs, curtains, bed and bath items, and outdoor items. So far this year, Retail Ecommerce Ventures has also acquired the brand assets and ecommerce businesses of Linens 'n Things, Franklin Mint and Modell’s Sporting Goods. Last year, the investment firm purchased the brand assets and ecommerce business of Dressbarn from the Ascena Retail Group. Retail Ecommerce Ventures was founded last year by Lopez and Alex Mehr. -- Business Buzz You can follow Daniel Urie on twitter @DanielUrie2018 and you can like PennLive’s business page on Facebook at @PennLiveBusiness If you purchase a product or register for an account through a link on our site, we may receive compensation. Our reputation for excellence is built on combining innovation with efficient project delivery. Our Vision A modern, sustainable and integrated energy infrastructure is a jigsaw of different solutions. We will develop an eco-system of global partnerships to help deliver that. Our Mission To accelerate the deployment of a modern, sustainable and integrated energy infrastructure, both on & off-grid, and which serves community, commercial and industrial needs. Our Values Best in class delivery, to the highest standards of safety, quality and collaboration, and in-line with our clients needs. At Pier Solutions, we are a bespoke manufacturer with in-house design and fabrication capabilities, delivering turnkey engineered solutions that seamlessly integrate multiple technologies. Our expertise uniquely positions us to support energy transition projects, including hydrogen, battery storage, renewables, and hybrid technology systems. We will guide you through every stage of the process to ensure your module meets your exact needs. Our unparalleled customer service guides you through every step of the process, from conceptualising a solution that meets your space needs to the intricate design and engineering phases. We ensure that each module is expertly fabricated and delivered, enhancing your workflow and maximising efficiency. Passionate about problem solving Headquartered in Kintore, Aberdeenshire, UK and active around the globe, our experienced team has a long track record of delivering innovative and engineered solutions. The pace and scale of the Energy Transition requires the mass rollout of innovative, modern and sustainable solutions. At Pier Solutions we are passionate about problem solving. Our solutions are custom-built by experts who have the experience to support all industries, whatever your requirements. By combining deep industry knowledge with multiple, integrated technologies and purpose-built solutions, and a long-standing track record of working in harsh conditions, we create sustainable and more efficient modular systems to support energy production, storage and distribution. Our team has supported clients across a wide range of industries including high profile media, entertainment, leisure, military, and energy transition projects. Our Approach 1. Providing conceptual and front end realisation for your project. Outlining the solutions, strategy, costs and schedule early in the project's development. 3. We believe no two projects are the same. Pier Solutions has a multi-discipline team that can deliver bespoke single unit or multi-phase modular projects. We thrive on innovation and collaboration and make every cubic metre count. 2. Project management is at the core of our offering. Pier Solutions will manage and support your project through all stages of the project lifecycle. Employing expedient delivery philosophies with a focus on Safety, Quality, Cost and Schedule. 4. We have developed a network of f abrication and design specialists within Scotland, England, Germany and China to allow us to strategically deliver our projects. 5. We deliver our projects safely , within budget, on time and to the highest quality , following globally recognised standards. Here, modern design is combined with the harbor outside, and you’ll find that the history and heritage of the harbor have been beautifully integrated indoors, creating a warm atmosphere that is both welcoming and relaxing. In other words, it’s your opportunity to choose the perfect base for your stay in Aalborg History, stylish comfort, and innovation Here, at Rendsburggade 5, coal was unloaded on the harbor pier by the company N.K. Strøyberg & Co. Kul-Koks until the 1960s. Hence the name Pier 5 Hotel. Today, industry has been replaced by culture, and Pier 5 Hotel is centrally located on Aalborg’s waterfront between Musikkens Hus and Utzon Center, with just a few minutes’ walk to Aalborg’s vibrant city life. Here, you get the pulse of the big city, the tranquility of the harbor, modern facilities, and Aalborg’s best location. BOOK STAY Choose from our most popular stays at our design hotel in the heart of Aalborg New Years stay Look forward to a truly magical New Year’s stay at Aalborg’s best hotel. READ MORE Fjordens Textur Look forward to cocktails from our renowned cocktail bar and dinner at the fantastic Restaurant Textur. READ MORE Waterfront views In collaboration with Musikkens Hus, you can enjoy the beautiful fjord view from various angles. READ MORE Fine Dining Fauna Look forward to an 11-course dinner at Restaurant Fauna and a luxurious stay in Aalborg’s largest suite. READ MORE Frequently asked questions Do you have any questions regarding your stay in Aalborg? Through the link below, you can find answers to the questions we are often asked. Otherwise, feel free to contact us directly for answers to your questions or tips for your stay in Aalborg. As a Bühlmann hotel, we are dedicated to providing you with the very best experience during your stay. Therefore, we are always pleased to hear from you before your arrival or while you are our guest. READ MORE Get inspired for other great experiences. Our location provides you with easy access to all the great things Aalborg is known for Aalborg is a vibrant city where opportunities to experience world-class culture and art flourish. When you stay at our hotel, you are right in the heart of the action—yet still in an area where the soothing waves of the fjord provide comfort and tranquility during your stay. Here are our recommendations for making the most of the city from our hotel—whether you’re on vacation or a business trip. Aalborg offers a bit of everything in a comfortable and manageable format. And with Pier 5 Hotel as your base, you are always close to the greatest experiences. Enjoy a weekend getaway in Aalborg. n the capital of North Jutland, you’ll find a cultural melting pot of ancient charm and modern opportunities side by side. When you stay at the hotel, it’s a great idea to start with a walk along the waterfront, which has undergone a significant transformation in recent years. This route takes you past Musikkens Hus, Nordkraft, which houses a theater, cinema, art galleries, and restaurants, the Utzon Center, and many other exciting attractions. The waterfront serves as a wide and open gateway to the city’s world-class architecture, Jomfru Ane Gade, and the wide range of dining options, all within a pleasant walking distance from the hotel. This is all intertwined with a wealth of street art, intriguing small galleries, and great shopping opportunities. On a slightly longer trip, you can visit the Zoo, Aalborg Street Food, Kunsten, and Aalborg Theater, for example. Here, you’ll find plenty of opportunities for a delightful weekend getaway in Aalborg. If you’re looking for something truly romantic, you can book one of our suites, which includes a bathtub in the room with free panoramic views over the Limfjord—a unique hotel experience in beautiful surroundings, perfect for a mini-vacation or a family holiday. BOOK STAY Get inspired for other great experiences. Create value for yourself and your employees with a great overnight stay. Due to the high standard and perfect location, our hotel is frequently chosen for stays in Aalborg by traveling business professionals. We offer suites and junior suites with ample space for focus and relaxation, as well as great opportunities for informal meetings in various areas of our lounge. The city’s best facilities for business. If you need a meeting room, we can also help facilitate it for you at one of our neighbors, either at the Utzon Center or Musikkens Hus, where you can turn focused work with a view of the water into an extravagant and inspiring experience. Additionally, we offer great corporate agreements if you regularly have business meetings or other work in Aalborg, where you seek a hotel experience with quality, hospitality, and style. Breakwater Hospitality Group Opens PIER 5 at Bayside Marketplace - Pier 5 Skip to content PIER 5 AT BAYSIDE MARKETPLACE | MIAMI, FLORIDA HOME EXPERIENCE EVENTS WEEKLY HAPPENINGS HOST AN EVENT WORLD’S FINEST COCKTAILS MENU CONTACT BOOK NOW News By pier5 December 20, 2023 Breakwater Hospitality Group Opens PIER 5 at Bayside Marketplace The premier open-air entertainment destination will be home to pay homage to the city’s most iconic fishing pier while delivering a vibrant experience for locals and visitors MIAMI – January 11, 2024 – Today, Breakwater Hospitality Group announces the grand opening of its latest open-air, waterfront concept PIER 5, a top-tier entertainment destination revitalizing Bayside Marketplace. PIER 5 will offer exciting activations, live music, delicious food and beverages paired with scenic waterfront views located at 401 Biscayne Blvd in Downtown Miami. Hospitality powerhouses and co-founders of Breakwater Hospitality Group, Emi Guerra and Alex Mantecon, are excited to grow their presence with unforgettable entertainment venues across South Florida and beyond. Created in partnership with Erick Passo, co-owner of Black Market Miami , the venue will be open under a soft opening period starting Tuesday, December 26, followed by the official grand opening weekend celebrations which will take place Thursday, January 11 to Sunday, January 14. PIER 5 will be open seven days a week from morning till evening and is inclusive for all ages with its signature deck games; multiple shaded lounge areas and bars; and entertainment stage. The venue will feature three bars, one of which is the largest bar in Miami measuring over 200 feet of bar space. The largest bar, The Rum Bar, will offer hundreds of different types of rum along with other popular types of spirits. With an emphasis on fresh, tropical drinks, The Rum Bar will specialize in mojitos and daiquiris. Additionally, the Tequila and Mezcal Bar will offer over 200 distinctive types of tequilas and mezcals, spotlighting signature margaritas among its offerings. PIER 5 will offer an array of food offerings showcasing beloved Bayside Marketplace hotspots. Food vendors include: Black Market Miami : Black Market Miami is a local sports bar that pays homage to the nostalgia of 1980s Miami. The menu offers classic bar food with a Miami twist, ranging from wings and burgers to ham croquettes and chicken churrasco. As a sports bar created by Miamians for Miamians, Black Market invites its guests to celebrate the rich history of the city. Ben’s Pizza : Ben’s Pizza is a slice-only pizzeria based in downtown Miami. Its menu offers favorites including Ben’s Classic Cheese, the Pepperoni Char Cup Pizza and so much more. All pizzas are made using the famous New York style, with hints of Italian flavors. While crafting such delicious food, it is Ben’s mission to give their visitors not only a taste of what real pizza should be but also a taste of the unique cultures that have made the dish popular. La Industria : La Industria is a bakery and café situated in Bayside Marketplace, founded by the singer and actor Nicky Jam. The menu features breakfast delicacies, including pancakes, waffles, and French toast, as well as Latin American specialties like malanga croquettes, arepas, and more. Skoops : Skoops is an authentic gelato and ice cream spot located in Bayside Marketplace. They offer unique flavors ranging from blueberry yogurt to dolce latte. Their gelato and ice cream are made fresh daily with high-quality ingredients, ensuring a delightful experience for those with a sweet tooth. “PIER 5 will add a new and exciting dimension to Bayside Marketplace, infusing the community with a fresh and lively atmosphere,” says Emi Guerra, co-founder of Breakwater Hospitality Group. “With great music, delicious cocktails and a welcoming atmosphere, the venue’s vibe speaks to the historic roots of the original fishing pier while creating a unique experience for locals and visitors alike. We are honored to have the opportunity to breathe new life into Bayside Marketplace and look forward to welcoming guests soon.” Named after South Florida’s most renowned fishing pier, the history of PIER 5 dates back to the early 1900s as it played a vital role as a fish market, tourist attraction and prime location for some of the best sport fishing in the area. The area hosted Miami’s most popular sport fishing competitions and served as a breeding ground for incredible innovation and development in fishing, including the invention of kite fishing. Today, Bayside Marketplace is still a launching point for sports fishermen and provides proximity for visitors to the Port of Miami and Miami International Airport. “PIER 5 is a representation of our commitment to celebrating Miami’s energetic culture by bringing people together and creating lasting memories. As Miami locals, we’re ready to reinvigorate Bayside Marketplace with PIER 5 as a destination for all to enjoy with creative event programming, delicious drinks and food on the bayfront,” says Alex Mantecon, co-founder of Breakwater Hospitality Group. Crafted by Saladino Design Studios , the venue’s design is a nod to Miami’s fishing culture with an elevated, contemporary tropical influence. The floor pattern pays homage to a ship’s journey from coast to coast, while the main bar front mirrors vintage boats with smooth curves and brass detailing. The second bar boasts glossy deep blue elements and ribbing details, offering a modern tribute to maritime aesthetics. The venue masterfully blends nostalgia with a sense of excitement about the present and future. PIER 5 represents a modernized take on an art-deco inspired brand, seamlessly incorporating marine elements such as nautical flags spelling out “PIER.” Upon entering, visitors immediately sense the feeling of being on a ship, with meticulously crafted woodwork defining the main bar front and custom furniture. PIER 5 joins Breakwater Hospitality Group’s impressive portfolio2 of destinations across South Florida including open-air waterfront venues such as The Wharf Fort Lauderdale , Regatta Grove in Coconut Grove and Carousel Club in Hallandale Beach as well as Miracle Mile’s beloved Irish pub JohnMartin’s and seafood-forward restaurant Rivertail in Downtown Fort Lauderdale. PIER 5 will be open Sunday – Thursday from 11:00 a.m. – 2:00 a.m. Friday – Saturday from 11:00 a.m. – 4:00 a.m. For more information, please visit PIER5.com and follow @PIER5bayside . About Breakwater Hospitality Group Breakwater Hospitality Group is a multi-concept food and beverage organization based in Miami, Florida. Founded in 2018 by Emi Guerra and Alex Mantecon, Breakwater Hospitality Group has transformed South Florida’s social scene with a concentration on quality beverages and cuisine paired with curating memorable, community hubs in unforgettable locations. Breakwater Hospitality Group operates open-air waterfront venue Regatta Grove in Coconut Grove; beloved Irish pub JohnMartin’s on Miracle Mile in Coral Gables; outdoor waterfront venue The Wharf Fort Lauderdale; pizza and Italian food concept The Piefather; seafood-forward restaurant Rivertail situated along Downtown Fort Lauderdale’s Riverwalk; and open-air gathering spot Carousel Club at Gulfstream Park in Hallandale Beach. Its latest concept, PIER 5, will open at Bayside Marketplace in Downtown Miami this year. For more information, visit www.breakwaterhg.com. Biscayne Bay Tribune PIER 5 officially opens along Miami’s bayfront By Community News Releases - February 10, 2024 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Getting your Trinity Audio player ready... PIER 5 officially opens along Miami’s bayfront The co-founders of Breakwater Hospitality Group, Emi Guerra and Alex Mantecon, along with Erick Passo, co-owner of Black Market Miami, hosted the grand opening of their newest concept, PIER 5, on Friday, Jan. 16. The grand opening treated guests to delectable craft cocktails and a glimpse of all that PIER 5 has to offer. The event included a ribbon-cutting ceremony, where (l-r) Passo, Guerra, Mantecon and Miami Mayor Francis Suarez officially marked the opening of the extraordinary new venue. PIER 5 is located at 401 Biscayne Blvd. Unit M100. Hours are Sunday-Thursday, 11 a.m.-2 a.m., and Friday-Saturday, 11 a.m.-4 a.m. ABOUT US: For more Miami community news, look no further than Miami Community Newspapers. This Miami online group of newspapers covers a variety of topics about the local community and beyond. Miami’s Community Newspapers offers daily news, online resources, podcasts and other multimedia content to keep readers informed. With topics ranging from local news to community events, Miami’s Community Newspapers is the ideal source for staying up to date with the latest news and happenings in the area. This family-owned media company publishes more than a dozen neighborhood publications, magazines, special sections on their websites, newsletters, as well as distributing them in print throughout Miami Dade County from Aventura, Sunny Isles Beach, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, Brickell, Coconut Grove, Pinecrest, South Miami, Kendall, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay and Homestead. Each online publication and print editions provide comprehensive coverage of local news, events, business updates, lifestyle features, and local initiatives within its respective community. Additionally, the newspaper has exclusive Miami community podcasts, providing listeners with an in-depth look into Miami’s culture. Whether you’re looking for local Miami news, or podcasts, Miami’s Community Newspapers has you covered. For more information, be sure to check out: https://communitynewspapers.com . If you have any questions, feel free to email Michael@communitynewspapers.com or Grant@communitynewspapers.com . The new Pier 5 at Bayside Marketplace The new Pier 5 at Bayside Marketplace What's going on in Miami? Miami’s Bayside Marketplace has been a destination for locals and visitors with over 100 shops and restaurants as well as an array of events, there’s always something happening at Bayside Marketplace . Now, Pier 5 is opening soon ! Pier 5 is located on the water at Bayside Marketplace , providing a new dining experience with waterfront views overlooking the Miami River. Casiola Miami vacation rentals are located close to Bayside Marketplace , which is a great place for your next vacation . What is Pier 5? Pier 5 is a new, unique concept coming soon to the historic Pier 5 , positioned in the heart of Bayside Marketplace . The site was once home to South Florida’s most famous fishing pier , which stood at what is now the Bayside Marketplace in downtown Miami . Guests can expect deck games such as corn hole, shuffleboard or life-sized Jenga , entertainment space including live music , and a shaded bar area with breathtaking views . In addition to its sister venues The Wharf Miami and The Wharf Fort Lauderdale , Pier 5 adds another option for visitors interested in outdoor dining experiences with waterfront views across Biscayne Bay at affordable prices. The bar will take a lot of inspiration from the site’s previous life as a fishing pier, seafood market, and tourist attraction popular during the ‘40s and ‘50s. The history of Pier 5 Pier 5 is a landmark in Miami . It’s the oldest pier in Miami . The history of Pier 5 dates back to the early 1900s , when it was a fish market and tourist attraction . During this time, it hosted some of Miami’s most popular sport fishing competitions and served as a breeding ground for incredible innovation and development in fishing. It was also the location where kite fishing got invented! Today, Bayside Marketplace is still known as the launching point for Miami’s serious sports fisherman, routinely bringing up the most impressive catches daily . When will Pier 5 open? It’s not known when exactly Pier 5 will open . It will be sometime this winter , but there are no firm dates yet . And while the food hall is slated to be open seven days a week from morning to evening, it should be noted that many of the restaurants have confirmed operating hours beyond those hours. The only thing you can do now waits with bated breath and cross your fingers that Pier 5 at Bayside Marketplace in Miami opens sooner rather than later ! The new Pier 5 , a restaurant and entertainment venue at Bayside Marketplace in Miami, is the brainchild of Breakwater Hospitality Group , a company that owns some of the most innovative concepts in food and beverage, and entertainment. They are known for creating unforgettable experiences that transcend time. Pier 5 will be an important part of the Bayside Marketplace experience because it will give visitors access to fresh local seafood and award-winning craft beers while they enjoy their favorite music or watch amazing sporting events on their enormous center screen. For more information about this amazing project, please visit our website at www.pier5.com About Bayside Marketplace Bayside Marketplace is a bustling entertainment shopping center located in the heart of Downtown Miami . It has become a landmark throughout the City of Miami , welcoming more than 24 million visitors annually. Bayside Marketplace offers something for everyone with over 100 shops and restaurants . Casiola Miami vacation rentals Pier 5 is the newest addition to Bayside Marketplace , and we can’t wait for you to see it! The opening of this new pier will bring even more exciting dining options and fun activities for kids . We offer unique properties close to the Bayside Marketplace that will make your perfect stay even better .
